user_query: I want to surprise my parents with a family gathering. Can you suggest some popular male artists for background music? Also, find out the greatest mainstream rock artists of all time. Additionally, check the current top songs in Hungary and provide me with the lyrics for Michael Jackson's song 'Bad'.

TaskList.description: Suggest popular male artists suitable for background music.
Find and list the greatest mainstream rock artists of all time.
Check the current top songs in Hungary.
Provide the lyrics for Michael Jackson's song 'Bad'.
